remarks: Lemma for ~ axsegcon .  Show that a particular ratio of distances is in the closed unit interval.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Sep-2013.)
statement:
axsegconlem2.1 $e |- S = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( A ` p ) - ( B ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem7.2 $e |- T = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( C ` p ) - ( D ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem7 $p |- ( ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A =/= B ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( sqrt ` S ) / ( ( sqrt ` S ) + ( sqrt ` T ) ) ) e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d C p $.
$d D p $.
$d N p $.
